comment: Dr Mc truly cares about her students and is willing to help in anyway she can. There were weekly quizzes on each chapter, several Launchpad activities for points and other assignments making this class very packed. It feels like a lot but she really wants you to learn. All tests and quizzes are lockdown with cam but open note.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--EXTRA CREDIT--Test heavy

comment: Dr. McNamara was a fantastic professor! I took her Intro to General Psychology Class online. Her notes on all lessons were very informative, though be sure to do the launchpad study activities to ensure adequate knowledge for the tests. She sticks very strictly to deadlines, so be sure to always be prepared. She was always kind and reachable.

Dr. Mc is the best professor I've had! Lectures are engaging and interesting. Very organized. Gives great feedback on assignments & tests if you have any questions about the material. Challenging class, but if you work hard you will learn SO much! Hope to take another class with her in the future. Truly inspirational professor!

She presented information in multiple different ways which I appreciated. Yes, you have to work for your grade, but she gives you everything you need. RM is a tough class -- get used to it! You may take a teacher that is easier but you won't learn as much. She gave me a great foundation for the following course, and she is there if you need her.

Not much was really taught by the teacher herself. All assignments on Launchpad, & the discussions were based on Launchpad readings. She grades kind of tough. She also isn't very helpful or caring. Not the worse course I've ever taken, but if I were to take Psych1101 online again, it wouldn't take her again.

Her online class had so many moving parts to it. I was very overwhelmed by the amount of work that we had to do, and honestly I do not feel like I really had any kind of interaction or learning directly from her. Everything was on a launchpad with the textbook. Too much work for a entrance level 1101 psych class.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--LOTS OF HOMEWORK

comment: Dr. McNamara is by far my favorite professor at KSU!!!! She is very tough and makes you work for your grade, but it is totally worth it! You will leave the class far above everyone else and with so much knowledge of the criteria that will allow you to flourish as a psychology major! I would take her again in a heartbeat!

Dr. Mac is honestly my favorite psychology professor! She makes her lectures fun and opens up the room for discussion! Since this is a lecture and a lab class, it is super important to come!!! Her tests are difficult, but if you come to class and study and take the time to learn, you'll pass with no problem!! Would highly recommend taking her!!!!

Took her online, and she couldn't run the software. Not a clear grader, her corrections never got posted. Also sends no reminder of assignments, and for an online class, she schedules everything during the week, and there is not much you can do on weekends (taking it online to work more hours? think again). Her test were nothing like any assignment

Great professor! 3 mandatory tests & 1 optional final that also replaces lowest test grade. Let's you use a note card on tests. Online virtual labs, quizzes & tests that will only help your grade (Mindtap). 2 sheep brain exams, 1 paper, & presentation. The class is difficult but you'll get the hang of things after awhile. Take her! She's wonderful!

Dr. Mac is a GREAT teacher. You have to work hard to earn your grade though. Very detailed power points & study guides. You need to come to class. She takes attendance but her lectures are very detailed and helpful. I would definitely take her again.

Dr. Mac is great. The class was not as horrible as some people make it seem, but this is probably because she was so clear. She teaches the entire period, very thorough. She teaches you to write in steps, so you aren't overwhelmed. She is extremely clear and gives great feedback before you turn in your final paper. Tests weren't awful; just study.

LOVE HER! She just cares about her students being successful. She sends reminders and updates about how the class is doing. Grades are posted with feedback which I absolutely love that way you know how to improve and improve your grade. You have a discussion and quiz just about every week, super easy. Just follow the schedule and you'll do fine!

RM is a difficult class by nature, but she is AWESOME! She does everything she can to help her students. Proposal was the toughest part of the class, but if you choose an interesting topic and work with good people, it is fun! Only complaint is it takes her a little while to grade assignments. Wish I could take her for all of my psych classes.

Dr. Mac does everything she can to make the material understandable with many great examples. But this course is very difficult and extremely dense with information. Attend class, even though it is not mandatory, if you want to pass.
Took her for research methods. It was a difficult class and I ended up with a B but I am completely satisfied. Such an amazing teacher. Would like to take her again in the future.

As a B/C student, this professor was on it. Get involved by asking questions and find a good study group & you'll pass easily. While attendance isn't required, you are dumb if you miss her classes. The material is too difficult and specific to skip and teach yourself. She's so nice and helpful. She is the professor other aspire to be.

LOVED HER! Took an honors section and the class was very rigorous but an A is obtainable. READ THE BOOK! Take notes as well, some tests are more note heavy than others. Very interesting class, super sweet professor. GO TO CLASS!
Dr. Mac was definitely my favorite professor. She does a great job at explaining what could be very difficult concepts. I hope to take more of her classes in the future.

This online class was a lot more interesting and thorough than I thought it would be honestly.  I learned a lot of really unique info but you have to study. Discussions and replies each week. Very helpful and responds quickly when emailed.  Takes a min to display discussion grades because of volume of classes, but very detailed. Highly recommend.

This is a difficult class but professor McNamara makes it easy. She gives baby steps to the major sections of the paper, which is very helpful. And her lectures are overall pretty entertaining. Excellent teacher!!!!! Take her and you won't regret it!!!!!

This is a hard course no doubt! However, Dr. Mc does all in her power to help. Dont expect to be spoon fed research methods as a whole is a large concept to grasp. Study hard! Attend Class! Ask questions! and you should do alright!

I took Honors Psychology with Dr. McNamara. She is an awesome teacher! She helps you if you need help understanding a certain concept, and she provides feedback on all of your work. There is a lot of information to retain, but she provides power point notes on Vista that you can access. Just study continuously and you'll be fine.

Nice teacher.  Class will get difficult at times, but usually only if you fail to read or fail to participate in class discussions or questions.  You will need to study hard for her class, yet if you put your effort into it and refrain from laziness, you will do fine.  So if you are a slacker, you will be in for a rude awakening.

Dr. McNamara made me realize how much harder psychology is than I thought it was.  I have always loved reading about psychology for fun.  I never knew there was so much to it!! She gives very hard exams but does occasionally curve grades and offer extra credit.  Take her if you want a challenging course, love psych, or are a psych major

What a great semester! the material is difficult but she makes it fun. she encourages online discussion and provides supplemental material and useful feedback. I really enjoyed this class. Work really hard to study. You'll enjoy the class if you put the work in.

Such an amazing professor! The material is challenging, but she makes it easily understood. Also, she makes a lot of effort to help students with assignments & is extremely organized. Even though attendance is not mandatory it is almost impossible to pass without going to class.

This was an honors class and I loved the material. She is a wonderful teacher and very knowledgeable, but she does not take any crap. You are welcome to meet with her and she will be willing to assist you. The workload was a bit heavy but most of it you could apply to life. Make sure you study in groups, use the concept map and website. ;)

Great Teacher! Research Methods is not easy, but you will do fine if you just do the practice quizzes on the textbook websites and take good notes in class. She breaks things up really well and is always willing to help. She is very organized and sticks to the syllabus. And she is very nice and down-to-earth. I definitely recommend her!

Not an easy class and not a pushover professor. She's extremely intelligent, knowledgable about her subject and has a very clear and deliberate teaching style. I really enjoyed her class. I wouldn't say she's the warmest bundle of sunshine I've ever encountered, but she's a damn good teacher and I'd take her again in a heartbeat.

At first I hated her class and I thought she was one of those people to pretends to be nice but is really mean. Turns out I was wrong. As the semester progressed her class grew more interesting and I realized that she is a genuinely friendly person. You have to read, study, and go to class, but it's worth it. I'd recommend her.

Great Professor! I took her for Psych 1101 and was more than prepared for Developmental Psych (3305). She does an excellent job teaching the material and keeping it interesting. I'm hoping to take another one of her classes for an Elective. DEFINATELY RECCOMEND.

She obviously knows her stuff, but the workload was overwhelming. And what we covered in an INTRO class was far too detailed. If you're planning on majoring in Psych (or just really interested in Psych), take her because you will be prepared for upper-level classes. If you're just trying to fulfill a general ed, don't take her.

She is knowledgeable and she does seem to care whether or not you learn. The workload is pretty heavy, but I don't have a problem with that. She is, however, VERY pretentious and closed-minded. She is very good at being rude and condescending in a "polite" way; she tries to act all nice and caring, but this persona is clearly just an artifice.
Her picture does not do her justice! She's way hotter and younger than it makes her look! Fabulous professor!

She's super fun! CRYSTAL clear so u'll kno what she wants. Her test R multiple choice &short answer. There is a pretty hefty group paper, but its not as bad as it sounds.She has a bunch of check points that keep u on schedule & u get credit for them. she's so great that u'll 4get that the class is 2hr &45min long! BEST TEACHER EVER! (SHOUT OUT!)

She is extremely helpful.  She responds to emails quickly and is always willing to schedule an appointment with you (even if its just to help you with study skills).  If you go to class and pay attention, you'll get a pretty good grade.  I learned a lot.  Also, she's not bad to look at.  It's just another reason to go to class.  :)

Attendance is not mandatory, but there are random activities that she takes for a grade.  Three extra credit points are available .  Tests are difficult, but she curves every one of them.  It was an ok class if you like lectures.
Not a good teacher. Her teacher's assistant does all of the grading, which getting the grade back is an extremely slow process. Unfair teacher as well.

i loooooved this class. the tests are super easy as long as you semi-pay attention in class. reading the book beforehand makes the lecture much clearer because it  is only an outline of what she thinks is important and test worthy from the book. she has a good, clear voice, too, so lectures are easy to pay attention in.
AWESOME teacher

She's a great teacher. Some students may not agree with her style because she's expects alot out her students, but it's worth it in the end. You will learn alot from her if your willing to put the time in. Her tests are tricky, but she will talk you through confusing questions.  Asking for help on her office hours helps. She's very nice and fair.

very strict, organized and kind of funny.She is very fair and will answer questions that you have.Pay attention in class and you will make it.This is an interesting but hard class.I would take her again anytime.

She's a great teacher.  She makes it very clear what is going to be on the test before hand.  She words questions on the test to make sure you understand the material.  if you KNOW the stuff, you'll do fine.  Great teacher-hard class.  Only grades when I took it were the 4 tests.

Avoid this professor, she ego trips, her tests questions are very tricky,AVOID AVOID AVOID...very boring class, a lot of busy work as well, she did give us the option of not taking the final if you are satisfied with you grade, a lot of work

Dr Mc is an excellent prof, I can't recommend her more!! She remembers what students go through & you can really tell she honestly CARES about her students. She is SO thorough and will never leave you wondering what is expected of you.  Her tests are challenging but she is VERY reasonable w/ grading & gives partial credit! Very likable! TAKE HER!:)
She is crazy! Run... Unless you love needy, hard to please blonds!

She is hot. But her class is kind of hard. She expects you to master the information. If you pay close attention, and read the book you will probably make a decent grade. However, her tests are extremely tricky. Also, she gets really pissed if you fall asleep in class, but she doesn't take attendance. So if you can't stay awake, don't come to class.

ok maybe she is really hot as hell but so are her tests. You'll have 4 exams each worth 25% and trust me they will be worded weirdly and you get a curve and that is the only good thing in class along with her appearence.
